sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from "uuid" import img1 from "../../images/img1.jpg" import "./index.css" const RoomDetails = () => { const [showCards, setShowCard] = useState(true) const [bookList, setBookList] = useState([]) const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ name: "satish", email: "", street: "", pincode: "", city: "", country: "", expires: "", cvc: "", cardNumber: "" }); const onClickPayNow = () => { const validation = (userInfo.cardNumber !== "") && (userInfo.cvc !== "") && (userInfo.expires !== "") if (validation) { const userDetails = { name: userInfo.name, email: userInfo.email, street: userInfo.street, pincode: userInfo.pincode, city: userInfo.city, country: userInfo.country, cardNumber: userInfo.cardNumber, cvc: userInfo.cvc, expires: userInfo.expires } setBookList([...bookList, userDetails]) setUserInfo({ name: "satish", id: uuidv4(), email: "", street: "", pincode: "", city: "", country: "", expires: "", cvc: "", cardNumber: "" }) setShowCard(true) } } const onClickInfo = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const validation = (userInfo.email !== "") && (userInfo.street !== "") && (userInfo.pincode !== "") && (userInfo.city !== "") && (userInfo.country !== "") if (validation) { setShowCard(false) } } return ( {value => { const { bookList } = value return (

Booking Details

Name: 26-06-2021

From Date: 26-06-2021

To Date: satish

Amount

Total Days: 3

Rent Per Day: 4500/-

Pay Now} modal className='pp'> {close => (
{showCards ? (
setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, email: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, street: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, pincode: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, city: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, country: e.target.value })} />
) : (
setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, cardNumber: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, expires: e.target.value })} /> setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, cvc: e.target.value })} />
)}
)}
) }} ) } export default RoomDetails
